channel.title: Odd GFX behavior

item.title: Odd GFX behavior
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Alright, in my npcHandler.java under the AttackPlayerMage(int) boolean, I added:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) {
	int randomAttack = misc.random(2);
	if (randomAttack == 0) { //melee
		if (p.distanceToPoint(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY) <= 1) {
			MageEmote = 2655;
			if (prayerhandler.pmelee[p.playerId]) {
				hitDiff = 0;
			} else {
				hitDiff = misc.random(110);
			}
			server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitDiff = hitDiff;
			server.playerHandler.players[Player].updateRequired = true;
			server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitUpdateRequired = true;
			server.playerHandler.players[Player].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	}
	if (randomAttack == 1) { //range
		MageEmote = 2652;
		p.playerGfx(451, 0);
		p.playerGfx(157, 0);
		if (prayerhandler.prange[p.playerId]) {
			hitDiff = 0;
		} else {
			hitDiff = misc.random(99);
		}
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitDiff = hitDiff;
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].updateRequired = true;
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitUpdateRequired = true;
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	if (randomAttack == 2) { //mage
		MageEmote = 2656;
		if (prayerhandler.pmage[p.playerId]) {
			hitDiff = 0;
		} else {
			hitDiff = misc.random(97);
		}
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitDiff = hitDiff;
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].updateRequired = true;
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].hitUpdateRequired = true;
		server.playerHandler.players[Player].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
}

It’s in the right spot, so don’t say that. There’s no compiler errors, and no runserver errors, but when I’m attacked by jad, it only does the fire blast GFX (157), and not the meteor GFX (451), also, if I add a GFX into the mage attack it doesn’t perform that GFX, only the fire blast. Anyone have any ideas at all? Appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 09:57:53 PM[/size][hr]No one?

Read full topic
